name: HistoryToday
0:
”Alexa, open History Today”
”Alexa, start History Today”
”Alexa, launch History Today”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: history today
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Humans have existed on earth for quite a few years. Many events have happened on this date in history. Today from History skill on Alexa shares one event from history based on the current day.

This skill uses Muffin Labs's API and pulls one event from today's date and reads it out to you. You can ask Alexa to repeat the same.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
